Key Arguments: The government is attempting to impose its views on Australians.
Australians have the ability to discern misinformation without government intervention.
There is a lack of trust in the government due to past actions, such as the handling of COVID-19.
The government may include intrusive elements in legislation without proper transparency.
Main Themes: Skepticism about government transparency and intentions
Notable Quotes: The current effort by the government to impose its own views on Australians will be fought by a majority of Australians who have the commonsense to filter out the bullshit flung at them by an authoritarian and arrogant government.
A shorter version of my submission is 'We don't trust you any more.'
The COVID scam did more damage to your reputation than anything over the last 50 years.
